summary: This document is an email communication regarding the movement of securities between Southern Financial and Southern Trust accounts. It includes instructions for handling these securities and is sent by Anastasia Dubov from J.P. Morgan to several recipients, including Amanda Kirby.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is the sender of the email and is involved in the communication regarding the movement of securities.

persons.name: Anastasia Dubov
persons.context: Anastasia Dubov is a global investment opportunities representative at J.P. Morgan who provides instructions on moving securities.

persons.name: Ham Beller
persons.context: Ham Beller is one of the recipients of the email regarding the securities movement.

persons.name: Jeanne
persons.context: Jeanne is mentioned as a recipient of the email but no further context is provided.

locations: 320 Park Ave, 14th Floor, New York, NY 10022
keyFacts: The email discusses the movement of securities between Southern Financial and Southern Trust accounts.
Anastasia Dubov provides instructions for handling the securities in the email.
The email is marked as confidential and includes disclaimers regarding the information shared.
